root.name: tan()

example.code: a = 0.0 inc = TWO_PI / 50.0 for i in range(0, 100, 2): line(i, 50, i, 50 + tan(a) * 2.0) a = a + inc

root.description: Calculates the ratio of the sine and cosine of an angle. This function expects the values of the angle parameter to be provided in radians (values from 0 to PI*2). Values are returned in the range infinity to -infinity.

parameter.label: radians
parameter.description: float: radian value, used to calculate the ration of the sine and cosine of an angle.
